name: Create Your Own Superhero for Spider-Man
name_original: Create Your Own Superhero for Spider-Man
description:
If You love Spiderman, he's back!! Everyone loves dress up games.. But they get boring. This is not your usual dress up game.
The combinations allow for seemingly endless fun!

Features:
- 8 Character
- 14 Weapons
- 20 Dresses
- 20 Masks
- 15 Accessories
- 19 pants
- 6 backgrounds settings
- that's over 4,500,000 combinations!
- Hours of entertainment

Start Creating Your Spiderman Today, Download Now!
